headline.main: Suspected Al Qaeda Militants Kill Six Yemeni Troops, Civilian: Official
headline.print_headline: Suspected Al Qaeda Militants Kill Six Yemeni Troops, Civilian: Official

lead_paragraph: Suspected al Qaeda militants opened fired on a Yemeni military checkpoint in the southern province of Abyan on Sunday, a security official and residents said, killing six troops and a civilian.
snippet: Suspected al Qaeda militants opened fired on a Yemeni military checkpoint in the southern province of Abyan on Sunday, a security official and residents said, killing six troops and a civilian....
